DOC.brief_title: The Labor Delivery Teamwork Intervention Trial
DOC.detailed_description: A cluster-randomized controlled trial conduct 7 intervention 8 control hospital evaluate effect teamwork training occurrence adverse outcomes process care labor delivery . The intervention , call Labor & Delivery Team Coordination Course , standardize teamwork training curriculum base crew resource management emphasize communication team structure . The primary outcome proportion delivery great equal 20 week gestation one adverse maternal and/or neonatal outcomes occur ( Adverse Outcome Index , AOI ) . Additional outcome include 11 clinical process measure .
